Polish parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-PL-en (Sejm 46.3, 2023-03-28) [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Sprawozdanie stenograficzne z obrad Sejmu RP, 8.kadencja, 46. posiedzenie, 3. dzień (2017-07-20)
Report of the session of the Sejm of the Republic of Poland, Term 8, Session 46, Day 3 (2017-07-20)

respStmt.resp: Pobieranie danych i konwersja do TEI
Data retrieval and conversion to TEI
Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation

bibl.title: Sprawozdanie stenograficzne z obrad Sejmu RP
Minutes of the Sejm of the Republic of Poland
bibl.publisher: Sprawozdanie stenograficzne z obrad Sejmu RP

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

revisionDesc.change: Tomaž Erjavec: Generate TEI version of MTed corpus.
Michał Rudolf: Generated corpus in Parla-CLARIN.

div.head: 46. posiedzenie Sejmu RP 8. kadencji, dzień 3
div.note: The meeting was chaired by Deputy Marshals Ryszard Terlecki, Stanisław Tyszka, Joachim Brudziński and Barbara Dolniak

kinesic.desc: The Vice Marshal strikes three times with a marshal's cane

u.note: The meeting is adjourned at 3 p.m. 22 min 13
